00099 // =======================================================================
00100 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =
00101 
00102 template<class B>
00103 inline B 
00104 BitUtility::BitUtility_setBit_impl( B& inInt, int bitnumber, bool bit ) {
00105    B bitmask = (B(1) << bitnumber);
00106    if ( bit ) {
00107       inInt |= bitmask;
00108    } else {
00109       inInt &= ~bitmask;
00110    }
00111    return inInt;
00112 }
00113 
00114 template<class B>
00115 inline bool
00116 BitUtility::BitUtility_getBit_impl( B inInt, int bitnumber ) {
00117    B bitmask = (B(1) << bitnumber);
00118    return ((inInt & bitmask) == bitmask);
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline byte
00122 BitUtility::setBit( byte &inbyte, int bitnumber, bool bit ) {
00123    return BitUtility_setBit_impl( inbyte, bitnumber, bit );
00124 }
00125 
00126 inline bool
00127 BitUtility::getBit( byte inbyte, int bitnumber ) {
00128    return BitUtility_getBit_impl( inbyte, bitnumber );
00129 }
00130

00132 BitUtility::setBit( uint16 &inInt, int bitnumber, bool bit ) {
00133    return BitUtility_setBit_impl( inInt, bitnumber, bit );
00134 }
00135

00137 BitUtility::getBit( uint16 inInt, int bitnumber ) {
00138    return BitUtility_getBit_impl( inInt, bitnumber );
00139 }
00140

00143    return BitUtility_setBit_impl( inInt, bitnumber, bit );
00144 }
00145 
00146 inline bool
00147 BitUtility::getBit( uint32 inInt, int bitnumber ) {
00148    return BitUtility_getBit_impl( inInt, bitnumber );
00149 }
00150 
00151 inline uint32
00152 BitUtility::nbrBits( uint32 x ) { 
00153    x = (x >> 1 & 0x55555555) + (x & 0x55555555); 
00154    x = (x >> 2 & 0x33333333) + (x & 0x33333333); 
00155    x = (x >> 4 & 0x0f0f0f0f) + (x & 0x0f0f0f0f); 
00156    x = (x >> 8 & 0x00ff00ff) + (x & 0x00ff00ff); 
00157    return (x >> 16) + (x & 0xffff); 
00158 }
